Articles.Content:
I am XenonBlade.

I\'ve been playing the free version for a few days now, and my only rocket that\'s actually gotten into orbit around something ended up orbiting the sun. It was meant to orbit Kerbin. The only part of it that got into orbit was the command module, because the rest of it exploded. Damn you ridiculously overpowered yet somehow nonfunctional SAS setup...

So yeah, I look forward to actually getting something into Kerbin orbit for a change.

Hi.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I was like you once, and now i am building rockets that can to to the mun, to minmus, and then back to Kerbin.

Welcome! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The key to orbit: Not giving up. I\'m guessing you know *how* to get there, but need practice. So whatever you do, keep trying to get there.

> 
> Welcome! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> The key to orbit: Not giving up. I\'m guessing you know *how* to get there, but need practice. So whatever you do, keep trying to get there.

Yeah, pretty much. I also think my rocket\'s too heavy, I should probably drop the extra fuel until I\'m attempting to reach the mun.
